text: @elonmusk @elonmusk is not just talking about lockdown....I think he's also referring to the bogus covid19 agenda, "vaccine passports," police arresting anyone outside even tho solo , and anything else taking away liberties in the name of safety. The lockdown was necessary, but it's time.
